page.title: 06THE DODDINGHURST FESTIVAL
page.content: Most local groups hold regular fund- raising events. The Olympic Football Club runs an annual{Donkey Derby}and the school P.A. has a barn dance and Disco. The school provides two musical entertainments a year. There are two drama groups "Minstrels" and "D.A.D.S" which perform regularly. 15 years ago the various groups rationalised their fund raising activities and started the biannual {Doddinghurst Festival}which lasts for nine days and includes displays, (this year with work done by children as part of the Domesday Project), social events, several concerts and which culminates in a Family Fun Day, with decorated floats and a fair on the Parish Field. Afterwards the proceeds are distributed between the contributing organisations.
